category.name: DecisionApps.RelationBrowser
category.category_description: Preferences for Decision Apps Relation Browser.

preference.name: RV1_DARB_Expand_Outgoing_Levels
preference.preference_description: Specifies the values used for the "Expand Outgoing Relations" menu in the Relationship Viewer application in the Active Workspace client. The menu will support 1-5 command values. Any values after the first 5 will be ignored.
